Before doing anything make sure that you understand the project structure and its requirements with all attached files. And create tasklist and finally then complete those tasks one by one systemitically.

This is a laravel intertia react project using shadcn-ui and tailwindcss for ui and zustand, tanstack query for state management and data fetching. And then using zod with react-hook-form for form validation. This is a CMS like project so every frontend pages should should controlable by its admin panel dashboard pages - and there we should put the default input text value as the current frontend page content. So admin can change the content from admin panel and all images should have a preview and when we upload a new image it should replace the old one. Plus when we delete, edit or save something in the admin panel it should show a toast notification for success or error using shadcn-ui sonner and cancel button correctly!

This is a larvel react inertia project used as a template - previously it was furniture e-commerce project but now its an e-club project to control and manage e-club activities. So, please study this codebase and then please make this project to e-club from that furniture e-commerce project. The new header and footer components are in the resources/js/components/header.tsx file and resources/js/components/footer.tsx file respectively. Please use those new header and footer components in the main layout file which is in layouts file. Please make sure that the new header and footer components are properly integrated by their respective admin panel page so that we can control all sections from the admin panel. Please make sure that all the functionalities of the e-club project are working properly after making these changes. There is new join page at resources/js/pages/join.tsx file. Please make sure that this join page is properly integrated and all functionalities are working properly. Please make sure that the design is responsive and works well on all devices. Please test the entire application thoroughly to ensure that there are no bugs or issues. And I also update the current homepage with the new e-club design so please update the admin panel home page with these new sections and make sure that all functionalities are working properly. Please complete these tasks as soon as possible. And I also update the admin/dashboard page with the new e-club admin dashboard design so please make sure that it stays correctly!!!

And also make new database so that no hardcoded data is in the frontend as without colors other data like text, image, links everything should come from the database. Please make sure that all the data is properly fetched from the database and displayed on the frontend. Please make sure that the admin panel has the ability to update all these data so that we can easily manage the content of the website. Please ensure that there are no hardcoded values in the frontend code and everything is dynamic and comes from the database. Please test the entire application thoroughly to ensure that there are no bugs or issues after making these changes. Please complete these tasks as soon as possible.
